[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
HUD_SPR
enum HUD_SPR {...}

Flags used by custom HUD sprites.

Values
HUD_SPR_OPAQUE

(65536) Draw opaque sprite.

HUD_SPR_MASKED

(131072) Draw masked sprite.

HUD_SPR_PLAY_ONCE

(262144) Play the animation only once.

HUD_SPR_HIDE_WHEN_STOPPED

(524288) Hide the sprite when the animation stops.
